infos.value: Lady Machérie...?
Lynx... What's the matter?
I seek your permission to return to King Robb's side.
Do as you will. You are in my father's service, after all.
You plan to tell Father of me, don't you?
Yes. I will tell him that Lady Machérie is going to Leonis of her own accord.
Hah. I wonder what's gotten into you?
What...?
It is pointless to deny it, Lynx. Your true concern is Mont.
I-it is nothing of the sort!
No matter. It's not as if I don't understand how you feel, after all.
Alas, the journey will not be easy. The road is rife with danger.
I understand the risk.
Though I did not inform you, I was attacked on my way here. I believe they were soldiers of Fennes.
Perhaps they are planning to separate me from Father.
But if so...they would try again.
Yet you still wish to return to Father's side?
Leonis is our enemy. There is naught that will change my thoughts on this matter.
That said, I do not wish to toil in a senseless battle. Besides...
Mont puts his own life at risk to protect you, Lady Machérie, as well as Schuzelt.
That is why...I, too, wish to be honorable.
That is just like you, Lynx. Then let me ask one more thing of you.
Whatever you wish, my lady.
Tell Father that Schuzelt has done nothing wrong.
What is it?
Is there nothing you wish to tell Mont...?
If he dies here like a dog, then that is all he will ever be.
Understood, my lady. I will not fail you.
Not once did I underestimate «Caelum», but...
This will not be an easy fight.
Survive, Mont...
